description:
After the awards ceremony for the contest, the South Tokyo crew return to their store, and Kazuma teaches a kid the joy of cooking bread. Follow along and learn how to make your very own Ja-pan in this episode!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Faisons tous du pain ! Le ja-pan 2 !
Let`s All Make Bread Together!! It`s Ja-pan No. 2!
Let`s Minna de Pan Tsukuri!! Japan 2 Gou ja!
ทุกคนมาทำขนมปังกันเถอะ! เจปังหมายเลข2จ้า
レッツみんなでパン作り!! ジャぱん2号じゃっ!
